```{r, warning = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
```
```{r}
dim(starwars)
starwars
```

```{r, eval = TRUE}
starwars %>%
  group_by(species, sex) %>%
  select(height, mass) %>%
  summarise(
    height = mean(height, na.rm = TRUE),
    mass = mean(mass, na.rm = TRUE)
  )
```
